user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to explore local attractions and landmarks. Can you recommend some must-visit places along our route? Additionally, can you provide me with the contact information of nearby healthcare facilities in case of emergencies?

TaskList.description: Identify the starting point and destination for the road trip.
Query for local attractions and landmarks along the planned route.
Compile a list of must-visit places based on user preferences and route.
Search for nearby healthcare facilities along the route.
Gather contact information for the identified nearby healthcare facilities.
